text: My new favorite place!! The pitas are the best and the owner is the nicest lady and really goes above and beyond in customer service.  You can tell your business is really valued here.
I went to the one in Monroe. Amazing food and huge portions. Good prices. Will def be back.

Absolutely a great place to eat.  Their menu has everything from salads, Gyros, burgers, and wings to awesome meals like Greek Chicken, Chicken Parm, fantastic fish dinners, steaks and everything in between.  Service is fast and friendly.  The portions are very generous.  The staff is very helpful and attentive.  The owners are there every day to see that everyone is served properly and enjoys their meal. I highly recommend Big Bitez for lunch or dinner.  You won't be sorry.
